page.title: 18RECREATION TOYS
page.content: {INFANT TOYS The infant children discussed their toys and we discovered teddy bears, soft toys and bicycles were popular with boys and girls.The boys chose to play with Action men,He-men figures, farms,tractors,cars,trucks,Go-karts and snooker tables.The girls favoured Barbie dolls for dressing up,baby dolls,prams,dolls houses,cookers, irons,Glow-worms,Etch-a-Sketch and one had a Laser Lite sword.Many children had access to radios and televisions and were greatly influenced in their choice of toys by advertising.
